Title: Ta'ameya (Egyptian Falafel)
Ingredients: ['2 cups dried split fava beans', '1 red onion, quartered', '½ cup fresh parsley', '½ cup fresh cilantro', '½ cup fresh dill', '3 cloves garlic', '1 ½ teaspoons ground coriander', '1 ½ teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 cup sesame seeds', 'vegetable oil for frying']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place fava beans in large bowl and cover with several inches of water.
', 'Step 2: Let soak, 8 hours to overnight.
', 'Step 3: Drain.
', 'Step 4: Combine soaked fava beans, red onion, parsley, cilantro, dill, garlic, coriander, salt, and cumin in a food processor; process to a dough-like consistency.
', 'Step 5: Heat a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 6: Add sesame seeds; cook, stirring occasionally, until toasted, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 7: Transfer to a large plate.
', 'Step 8: Shape fava bean mixture into balls.
', 'Step 9: Roll in sesame seeds to coat.
', 'Step 10: Fill a large saucepan 1/4 full with oil; heat over medium heat.
', 'Step 11: Fry fava bean balls in batches until golden brown, 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Drain on paper towels.
']

Title: Lamb Tagine
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '2 pounds lamb meat, cut into 1 1/2 inch cubes', '2 teaspoons paprika', '¼ teaspoon ground turmeric', '½ teaspoon ground cumin', '¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '¼ teaspoon ground cloves', '½ teaspoon ground cardamom', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '½ teaspoon ground ginger', '1 pinch saffron', '¾ teaspoon garlic powder', '¾ teaspoon ground coriander', '2 medium onions, cut into 1-inch cubes', '5 carrots, peeled, cut into fourths, then sliced lengthwise into thin strips', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon freshly grated ginger', '1 lemon, zested', '1 (14.5 ounce) can homemade chicken broth or low-sodium canned broth', '1 tablespoon sun-dried tomato paste', '1 tablespoon honey', '1 tablespoon cornstarch', '1 tablespoon water']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place diced lamb in a bowl, toss with 2 tablespoons of the olive oil, and set aside.
', 'Step 2: In a large resealable bag, toss together the paprika, turmeric, cumin, cayenne, cinnamon, cloves, cardamom, salt, ginger, saffron, garlic powder, and coriander; mix well.
', 'Step 3: Add the lamb to the bag, and toss around to coat well.
', 'Step 4: Refrigerate at least 8 hours, preferably overnight.
', 'Step 5: Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a large, heavy bottomed pot over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 6: Add 1/3 of the lamb, and brown well.
', 'Step 7: Remove to a plate, and repeat with remaining lamb.
', 'Step 8: Add onions and carrots to the pot and cook for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Stir in the fresh garlic and ginger; continue cooking for an additional 5 minutes.
', 'Step 10: Return the lamb to the pot and stir in the lemon zest, chicken broth, tomato paste, and honey.
', 'Step 11: Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 1 1/2 to 2 hours, stirring occasionally, until the meat is tender.
', 'Step 12: If the consistency of the tagine is too thin, you may thicken it with a mixture of cornstarch and water during the last 5 minutes.
']
Nutrition Label: {'calories': '423 calories', 'carbohydrateContent': '23.6 g', 'cholesterolContent': '109.2 mg', 'fatContent': '20.5 g', 'fiberContent': '4.6 g', 'proteinContent': '35.8 g', 'saturatedFatContent': '4.6 g', 'sodiumContent': '1128.7 mg', 'sugarContent': '11.1 g'}

Title: Gages
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon butter', '1 eggplant, peeled and thinly sliced', '1 fresh red chile pepper, seeded and chopped', '4 tomatoes, sliced', '1 red onion, sliced', '¼ cup vinegar', '3 tablespoons vegetable oil', '¼ cup unsweetened flaked coconut', '¼ cup unsalted dry-roasted peanuts']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Fry the eggplant in the butter until lightly browned, stirring frequently.
', 'Step 3: Remove from heat, and set aside to cool slightly.
', 'Step 4: In a large bowl, combine the hot pepper, tomatoes, onion, and eggplant.
', 'Step 5: Mix together the vinegar and oil, pour over the vegetables, and toss gently to coat.
', 'Step 6: Cover, and chill for at least 3 hours, or overnight.
', 'Step 7: Toss salad with coconut and peanuts just before serving.
']

Title: Cape Malay Pickled Fish
Ingredients: ['½ cup vegetable oil for frying', '3 pounds cod fillets, cut into 2 to 3 ounce portions', 'salt to taste', '2 large onions, peeled and sliced into rings', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '8 whole black peppercorns', '4 whole allspice berries', '3 bay leaves', '1 red chile pepper, seeded and sliced lengthwise', '2 cups red wine vinegar', '½ cup water', '½ cup packed brown sugar, or to taste', '2 tablespoons curry powder', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '2 teaspoons ground cumin', '2 teaspoons ground coriander']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Season the fish with salt and place in the skillet.
', 'Step 3: Fry on both sides until fish is browned and cooked through, about 5 minutes per side.
', 'Step 4: Remove from the skillet and set aside.
', 'Step 5: Fry the onions and garlic in the same skillet over medium heat until translucent.
', 'Step 6: Add the peppercorns, allspice berries, bay leaves, and red chile pepper.
', 'Step 7: Pour in the vinegar and water and bring to a boil.
', 'Step 8: Stir in the brown sugar until dissolved.
', 'Step 9: Season with curry powder, turmeric, cumin and coriander.
', 'Step 10: Taste and adjust the sweetness if desired.
', 'Step 11: Layer pieces of fish and the pickling mixture in a serving dish.
', 'Step 12: Pour the liquid over until the top layer is covered.
', 'Step 13: Allow to cool then cover and refrigerate for at least 24 hours before serving.
']

Title: South African Traditional Vetkoek (Fried Bread)
Ingredients: ['2 cups lukewarm water', '¼ cup white sugar', '1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast', '7 cups all-purpose flour', '2 teaspoons salt', '3 cups oil for frying']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Mix lukewarm water, sugar, and yeast in a small bowl.
', 'Step 2: Let stand until yeast softens and begins to bubble slightly, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Sift flour and salt together in a large bowl.
', 'Step 4: Pour water mixture over flour mixture and knead until dough is smooth and elastic, 5 to 7 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Cover bowl with clean cloth and let dough rise until until doubled in volume, about 45 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Pinch off a piece of dough about the size of a tennis ball; roll until smooth.
', 'Step 7: Flatten ball of dough until it is the size of palm; set aside on a floured work surface.
', 'Step 8: Repeat with remaining dough.
', 'Step 9: Heat oil in a deep-fryer or large saucepan to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 10: Fry flattened pieces of dough in the hot oil, 2 to 3 pieces at a time, until golden brown, about 3 minutes per side.
']

Title: Best Bobotie
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 medium onions, minced', '1 ½ pounds ground beef', '1 cup milk', '2 slices Texas toast thick-sliced bread', '½ cup raisins', '1 teaspoon apricot jam', '1 tablespoon hot chutney', '½ tablespoon curry powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 large egg', '1 pinch salt', '1 bay leaf']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Lightly grease a 9x13-inch baking dish.
', 'Step 3: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 4: Cook the onions in the hot oil until soft.
', 'Step 5: Break the ground beef into the skillet and cook until brown.
', 'Step 6: Place the milk in a shallow dish.
', 'Step 7: Soak the bread in the milk.
', 'Step 8: Squeeze the excess milk from the bread.
', 'Step 9: Set the milk aside.
', 'Step 10: Add the bread to the beef mixture.
', 'Step 11: Stir in the raisins, apricot jam, chutney, curry powder, salt, and black pepper.
', 'Step 12: Pour the mixture into the prepared baking dish.
', 'Step 13: Bake in the preheated oven 1 hour.
', 'Step 14: While the bobotie bakes, whisk together the reserved milk, egg, and a pinch of salt.
', 'Step 15: Pour over top of the dish.
', 'Step 16: Lay the bay leaf onto the top of the milk mixture.

', 'Step 18: Remove bay leaf before serving.

Title: Chakchouka (Shakshouka)

Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Stir in the onion, bell peppers, and garlic; cook and stir until the vegetables have softened and the onion has turned translucent, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 3: Combine the tomatoes, cumin, paprika, salt, and chile pepper into a bowl and mix briefly.
', 'Step 4: Pour the tomato mixture into the skillet, and stir to combine.
', 'Step 5: Simmer, uncovered, until the tomato juices have cooked off, about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Make four indentations in the tomato mixture for the eggs.
', 'Step 7: Crack the eggs into the indentations.
', "Step 8: Cover the skillet and let the eggs cook until they're firm but not dry, about 5 minutes.
"]

Title: South African Melktert (Milk Tart)
Ingredients: ['3 tablespoons butter, melted', '1 cup white sugar', '3 egg yolks', '1 cup cake flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '¼ teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '4 cups milk', '3 egg white', '1 tablespoon cinnamon sugar']

['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Coat a 9-inch deep dish pie plate with vegetable oil cooking spray.
', 'Step 3: In a large bowl, mix together the butter and sugar until smooth.
', 'Step 4: Add the egg yolks and beat until light and fluffy.
', 'Step 5: Sift in the cake flour, baking powder and salt, and stir until well blended.
', 'Step 6: Mix in the vanilla and milk.
', 'Step 7: In a separate bowl, whip the egg whites to stiff peaks using an electric mixer.
', 'Step 8: Fold into the batter.
', 'Step 9: Pour into the prepared pie plate, and sprinkle cinnamon sugar over the top.
', 'Step 10: Bake for 25 minutes in the preheated oven, then reduce the temperature to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).

Title: Ras el Hanout
Ingredients: ['1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '¾ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '¾ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '½ teaspoon ground white pepper', '½ teaspoon ground coriander seed', '½ teaspoon ground cayenne pepper', '½ teaspoon ground allspice', '½ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '¼ teaspoon ground cloves']

Title: Harissa Powder
Ingredients: ['10 dried, smoked chile peppers', '2 tablespoons cumin seeds', '2 tablespoons coriander seeds', '2 tablespoons caraway seeds', '½ teaspoon multi-colored whole peppercorns', '2 tablespoons smoked paprika', '½ tablespoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon smoked salt', '1 teaspoon dried parsley', '1 teaspoon dried oregano']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Remove and discard stems and seeds from dried chiles.
', 'Step 2: Slice chiles in half or quarters, if they are large.
', 'Step 3: Heat a cast iron skillet over medium-low heat.
', 'Step 4: Add chiles and heat through to ensure all the moisture has evaporated.
', 'Step 5: Remove and place on a rack to cool.
', 'Step 6: Place cumin seeds, coriander seeds, caraway seeds, and peppercorns to skillet.
', 'Step 7: Stir seeds and toast until fragrant but not burning, about 3 minutes.
', 'Step 8: Remove and allow to cool.
', 'Step 9: Grind chiles and toasted seeds with a mortar and pestle into a coarse powder.
', 'Step 10: Add smoked paprika, garlic powder, smoked salt, parsley, and oregano.
', 'Step 11: Continue to blend until all spices are completely combined and pulverized.
']

Title: Mandazi (African Donuts)
Ingredients: ['1 cup warm milk', '¼ cup vegetable oil', '¼ cup fine white sugar', '1 medium egg', '2 teaspoons instant yeast', '½ teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon ground cardamom', '3 ½ cups all-purpose flour, sifted', 'vegetable oil for deep frying']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Combine milk, 1/4 cup vegetable oil, sugar, egg, instant yeast, salt, and cardamom in a large bowl.
', 'Step 2: Mix in flour, 1 cup at a time, until dough comes together and is easily handled.
', 'Step 3: Knead dough on a flat work surface until no longer sticky.
', 'Step 4: Put dough back in the bowl, cover, and let rise in a warm area until doubled, about 1 hour.
', 'Step 5: Press dough down gently.
', 'Step 6: Knead it briefly and divide it into 4 portions.
', 'Step 7: Roll each portion into a ball; keep covered with a cloth to prevent them from drying out.
', 'Step 8: Roll 1 ball into a 1/3-inch-thick circle on a floured work surface.
', 'Step 9: Cut into 4 triangles using a pizza cutter.
', 'Step 10: Repeat with remaining balls of dough, keeping other dough covered.
', 'Step 11: Heat oil in a deep-fryer or large saucepan over medium heat.
', 'Step 12: Fry dough triangles 3 or 4 at a time, without overcrowding, until puffed like balloons, 1 to 2 minutes.
', 'Step 13: Turn and continue frying until golden brown, 1 to 2 minutes more.
', 'Step 14: Drain on paper towels.
', 'Step 15: Repeat with remaining dough.
']

Title: Egusi Soup
Ingredients: ['¾ cup pumpkin seeds', '1 ½ pounds cubed beef stew meat', '½ cup peanut oil', '2 large tomatoes, chopped', '1 small onion, chopped', '2 habanero peppers, seeded and minced', '18 ounces tomato sauce', '3 tablespoons tomato paste', '1 ½ cups water', '2 pounds fresh shrimp, peeled and deveined', '1 pound fresh spinach, washed and chopped']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Place pumpkin seeds in a blender and blend for 30 to 40 seconds or until mixture is a powdery paste.
', 'Step 2: Set aside.
', 'Step 3: Wash beef and cut into bite-size cubes.
', 'Step 4: Season with salt.
', 'Step 5: In large pot, heat oil over medium-high heat for 4 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add beef and saute for 3 to 5 minutes or until brown but not cooked through.
', 'Step 7: Place tomatoes, onions, and pepper in a blender and blend for about 30 seconds or until smooth.
', 'Step 8: Add tomato mixture to meat, reduce heat to medium-low, and cover.
', 'Step 9: Cook for 40 to 50 minutes or until meat is tender.
', 'Step 10: Add tomato sauce, water, and shrimp and simmer for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 11: Add spinach and ground pumpkin seeds and continue to simmer 10 minutes more.
']

Title: Sambusa
Ingredients: ['1 (14 ounce) package spring roll wrappers', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 pounds ground beef', '1 leek, chopped', '2 teaspoons ground cumin', '2 teaspoons ground cardamom', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 small onion, finely chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon all-purpose flour', '1 tablespoon water, or as needed', '1 quart oil for frying']

['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
', 'Step 2: Add onions, leek and garlic, and cook, stirring until the onions are transparent.
', 'Step 3: Add ground beef, and cook until about halfway done.
', 'Step 4: Season with cumin, cardamom, salt and pepper.
', 'Step 5: Mix well, and continue cooking until beef has browned.
', 'Step 6: In a small dish or cup, mix together the flour and water to make a thin paste.

', 'Step 8: Fill the cone with the meat mixture, close the top, and seal with the paste.
', 'Step 9: Repeat until wraps or filling are used up.

', 'Step 11: There should be enough oil to submerge the wraps.
', 'Step 12: Fry the Sambusa a few at a time until golden brown.
', 'Step 13: Remove carefully to drain on paper towels.
']

Title: Berbere Spice Blend
Ingredients: ['½ cup ground dried New Mexico chiles', '¼ cup paprika', '1 tablespoon cayenne pepper', '1 teaspoon onion powder', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1 teaspoon cumin', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '1 teaspoon ground cardamom', '1 teaspoon ground fenugreek', '½ teaspoon garlic powder', '½ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '¼ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '½ teaspoon ground allspice', '½ teaspoon ground cloves']

Title: Slow Cooker Chicken Marrakesh
Ingredients: ['1 onion, sliced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '2 large carrots, peeled and diced', '2 large sweet potatoes, peeled and diced', '1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained and rinsed', '2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into 2-inch pieces', '½ teaspoon ground cumin', '½ teaspoon ground turmeric', '¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon', '½ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon dried parsley', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes']

Title: Chicken Tagine
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '8 skinless, boneless chicken thighs, cut into 1-inch pieces', '1 eggplant, cut into 1 inch cubes', '2 large onions, thinly sliced', '4 large carrots, thinly sliced', '½ cup dried cranberries', '½ cup chopped dried apricots', '2 cups chicken broth', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '2 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '2 teaspoons garlic salt', '1 ½ teaspoons ground cumin', '1 ½ teaspoons ground ginger', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '¾ teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 cup water', '1 cup couscous']

['Step 1: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
', 'Step 2: Place the chicken pieces and eggplant in the heated oil; stir and cook until the chicken is browned on all sides but not cooked through.
', 'Step 3: Remove the skillet from the heat.
', 'Step 4: Place the browned chicken and eggplant on the bottom of a slow cooker.
', 'Step 5: Layer the onion, carrots, dried cranberries, and apricots over the chicken.
', 'Step 6: Whisk together the chicken broth, tomato paste, lemon juice, flour, garlic salt, cumin, ginger, cinnamon, and ground black pepper in a bowl.
', 'Step 7: Pour the broth mixture into the slow cooker with the chicken and vegetables.
', 'Step 8: Cook on High setting for 5 hours, or on Low setting for 8 hours.
', 'Step 9: Bring water to boil in a saucepan.

Title: Umm Ali
Ingredients: ['1 (17.25 ounce) package frozen puff pastry, thawed', '5 cups milk', '1 cup white sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '¼ cup raisins', '¼ cup slivered almonds', '¼ cup pine nuts', '¼ cup chopped pistachio nuts', '¼ cup sweetened, flaked coconut']

Title: Make-Ahead Vegetarian Moroccan Stew
Ingredients: ['1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '½ teaspoon ground ginger', '¼ teaspoon ground cloves', '¼ teaspoon ground nutmeg', '¼ teaspoon ground turmeric', '⅛ teaspoon curry powder', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 sweet onion, chopped', '2 cups finely shredded kale', '4 (14 ounce) cans organic vegetable broth', '1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained', '1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes, undrained', '3 large potatoes, peeled and diced', '2 sweet potatoes, peeled and diced', '4 large carrots, chopped', '1 cup dried lentils, rinsed', '½ cup chopped dried apricots', '1 tablespoon honey', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper, to taste', '1 tablespoon cornstarch', '1 tablespoon water']

', 'Step 2: Melt butter in a large pot over medium heat.

', 'Step 8: Dissolve cornstarch in water; stir into stew and simmer thickened, about 5 minutes.
']

Title: West African Peanut Stew
Ingredients: ['2 tablespoons peanut oil', '1 red onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh ginger', '1 pound chicken, cut into chunks', '1 tablespoon crushed red pepper, or to taste', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '5 cups chicken stock', '3 small sweet potatoes, cut into chunks', '1 (16 ounce) can chopped tomatoes, with liquid', '¼ pound collard greens, roughly chopped', '1 cup chunky peanut butter']

', 'Step 3: Season with the crushed red pepper, salt, and black pepper.

Title: Traditional Baba Ghanoush
Ingredients: ['1 large eggplant', '1 ½ tablespoons tahini sauce', '4 cloves garlic, smashed', '½ lemon, juiced', '½ teaspoon red pepper flakes', 'salt to taste', '1 tablespoon olive oil, or to taste', '1 pinch dried parsley flakes, for garnish']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Arrange oven racks so you have one low and one high in the oven.
', 'Step 3: Cut a shallow slit along the side of the eggplant and place into a baking dish.
', 'Step 4: Roast in preheated oven on the lower rack until the eggplant is completely shrunken and soft, about 40 minutes.
', 'Step 5: Move dish to higher rack and continue baking until the skin is charred, about 5 minutes more.
', 'Step 6: Let eggplant cool until cool enough to handle.
', 'Step 7: Peel and discard skin from eggplant.
', 'Step 8: Put eggplant into a bowl; add tahini, garlic, lemon juice, red pepper flakes, and salt.
', 'Step 9: Stir until ingredients are evenly mixed.
', 'Step 10: Drizzle olive oil over the baba ghanoush and garnish with parsley.
']

Title: Moroccan Lentil Soup
Ingredients: ['2 onions, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon grated fresh ginger', '6 cups water', '1 cup red lentils', '1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained', '1 (19 ounce) can cannellini beans', '1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '½ cup diced carrots', '½ cup chopped celery', '1 teaspoon garam masala', '1 ½ teaspoons ground cardamom', '½ teaspoon ground cayenne pepper', '½ teaspoon ground cumin', '1 tablespoon olive oil']

Title: Tomato Bredie
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '3 ½ pounds lamb or mutton breast chops, chopped into portions', '2 tablespoons cake flour', '1 large onion, chopped', '2 ¼ pounds fresh tomatoes, chopped', '1 teaspoon salt', '½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '6 whole white peppercorns', '2 bay leaves', '1 teaspoon brown sugar', '1 tablespoon white vinegar', '1 dash Worcestershire sauce', '1 cube beef bouillon cube', '2 medium potatoes, quartered']

['Step 1: Heat oil over medium-high heat in a large, heavy-bottomed saucepan.
', 'Step 2: Dredge meat in flour, and cook in hot oil until well browned.
', 'Step 3: Stir in onions, and cook until onions are soft, about 5 minutes.
', 'Step 4: Mix in tomatoes.
', 'Step 5: Season with salt, black pepper, white peppercorns, bay leaves, brown sugar, vinegar, Worcestershire sauce, and beef bouillon cube.
', 'Step 6: Cover, reduce heat, and simmer for 1 1/4 hours.
', 'Step 7: Stir occasionally, making sure nothing sticks on the bottom of the pot.
', 'Step 8: Stir in the potatoes and cook for an additional 45 minutes, until the potatoes are done and the meat is tender.
']

Title: Moroccan Chicken
Ingredients: ['1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast meat - cubed', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '2 carrots, sliced', '2 stalks celery, sliced', '1 tablespoon minced fresh ginger root', '½ teaspoon paprika', '¾ teaspoon ground cumin', '½ teaspoon dried oregano', '¼ teaspoon ground cayenne pepper', '¼ teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 ½ cups chicken broth', '1 cup crushed tomatoes', '1 cup canned chickpeas, drained', '1 zucchini, sliced', '1 tablespoon lemon juice']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Season chicken with salt and brown in a large saucepan over medium heat until almost cooked through.
', 'Step 2: Remove chicken from pan and set aside.
', 'Step 3: Saute onion, garlic, carrots and celery in same pan.
', 'Step 4: When tender, stir in ginger, paprika, cumin, oregano, cayenne pepper and turmeric; stir fry for about 1 minute, then mix in broth and tomatoes.
', 'Step 5: Return chicken to pan, reduce heat to low and simmer for about 10 minutes.
', 'Step 6: Add chickpeas and zucchini to pan and bring to simmering once again; cover pan and cook for about 15 minutes, or until zucchini is cooked through and tender.
', 'Step 7: Stir in lemon juice and serve.
']

Title: African Pompano Fish Stew
Ingredients: ['1 tablespoon seafood seasoning', '1 tsp ground yellow African pepper', '1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '1 (2 pound) whole Golden Pompano fish', '2 ½ tablespoons palm oil', '1 medium yellow onion, chopped', '2 large carrots, sliced', '1 medium red bell pepper, cut into bite-sized pieces', '1 medium green bell pepper, cut into bite-sized pieces', '1 medium sweet potato, peeled and cut into bite-sized pieces', '4 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 (14.5 ounce) can fire-roasted diced tomatoes, undrained', '3 cups seafood stock', '2 large fresh bay leaves']
Cooking Instructions:
['Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
', 'Step 2: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
', 'Step 3: Mix seafood seasoning and ground yellow pepper together in a small bowl.
', 'Step 4: Place tomato paste in another bowl and mix in 1/2 of the seasoning mixture; set aside.
', 'Step 5: Clean fish and pat dry.
', 'Step 6: Season both sides with the remaining seasoning mixture.
', 'Step 7: Place on the prepared baking sheet.
', 'Step 8: Bake in the preheated oven for 10 minutes.
', 'Step 9: Meanwhile, heat oil in a Dutch oven.
', 'Step 10: Add onion, carrots, bell peppers, sweet potato, and garlic.
', 'Step 11: Stir well and cook until vegetables begin to soften 3 to 5 minutes.
', 'Step 12: Stir in the reserved tomato paste mixture until well combined.
', 'Step 13: Add diced tomatoes and juice; stir well.
', 'Step 14: Stir in seafood stock.
', 'Step 15: Lower heat, cover with a lid, and simmer until sweet potatoes are soft, but not mushy, 5 to 8 minutes.
', 'Step 16: Add fish to the pot.
', 'Step 17: Put the lid back on and simmer for 5 minutes.
', 'Step 18: Taste and adjust seasoning if needed.
']
